## GlyphManager.clipStringToWidth() method

Clips a string so that it's width is not larger than the given value

**Signature:**

```typescript
clipStringToWidth(str: string, width: number, charMargin: number, start: number, font: Font): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | The string to be clipped |
|  width | number | The desired maximum width |
|  charMargin | number | Margin size between characters |
|  start | number | Start index of the string to be clipped |
|  font | [Font](doc/markdown/./device.font.md) | Font of the string |

**Returns:**

number
